name: Rhythm Control 2
description:
The #1 music game in over 10 countries!

Rhythm Control 2 is now free to play and supported by in game ads. Purchase any song pack to remove all the ads.

Rhythm Control 2 is finally here with improved gameplay features, a shiny new interface and a surplus of new tracks to play!

4,5 stars out of 5 - "Daikon Media clearly has the music genre nailed" - The App Shack

Rhythm Control 2 is the sequel to the addictive music game that topped the charts in Japan and Sweden. Touch the markers in rhythm with the music and try to get a high score! Featuring music from both Japanese and western bands and musicians, including Bit Shifter, YMCK, Boeoes Kaelstigen and Slagsmålsklubben.

- Sequel to the #1 music game in Japan and Sweden that was featured as “gaming app of the day” by Kotaku!
- Universal app
- New “course mode” with online leaderboards through Game Center
- Addicitve gameplay designed specifically for touch screens
- Multiple difficulty levels makes the game enjoyable for rhythm game newcomers and veterans alike!
- Varied tracklist consisting of songs from both western and Japanese musicians
- Additional tracks available as in app purchases.
- Silky-smooth gameplay at 60 FPS
- Tested on iPhone 4, iPhone 4S, iPhone 5, iPod Touch 4th generation as well as 2nd and 3rd generation iPad. Compatibility with other devices is not guaranteed.

Tracklist:
Activation Theme - Bit Shifter
Neko Nadetai - YMCK
Yrsel 606 - Slagsmålsklubben
Seek Me - Phoenix Project
Freaky Boyz - Donk Terrorist
Kokoro - Martin feat. Vivian
Kantillo - Boeoes Kaelstigen
Mr. Sheep and Mr. Bee - Hideki Kaiji
Let's Dance Tonight - 61 Degrees
Stars - 61 Degrees
Another Day - 61 Degrees
Kagami - 61 Degrees
Europhonic - 61 Degrees
Fly With Me - 61 Degrees
Party Time - 61 Degrees
Kiss Me Tonight - 61 Degrees feat. DreamTuner
I’ll Be Late - Foozogz
And perhaps a hidden track...?

Some of the songs are locked initially. Playing the game a few times will unlock all the songs.

Four song packs with three songs each are available as in app purchases. Additional song packs will be released on a regular basis.

We'd love to hear from you! We highly value the opinions and suggestions of our players. If you'd like to contact us, you can reach us at @daikonsoft on Twitter or visit our webpage at www.daikonsoft.com
